pages.text:
About
Us
Row Backgrounds
OUR STORY
EST
1984
We’re more than just a sports bar. To tourists, we’re a must-stop for a game. To Miami, we’re a well-known neighborhood bar. To locals, we’re a second home. Old Tom’s Sports Bar, formerly known as Tom’s NFL, has been a long standing hub for all things sports in Miami. From catching the game, to a quick bite or afterwork happy hour, we’ve seen all sports lovers come through ours doors for over 30 years.
Our menu alone is something to boast about. With an extensive craft beer selection, award winning chicken wings, game day specials and rotating daily specials, we are bringing you the best and freshest Miami has to offer all while enjoying your highly anticipated game. Catch every game at this neighborhood bar where you can enjoy the view on our HD Televisons and massive projector screens. Old Tom’s Sports Bar is placed for family and friends to enjoy, sip, eat and catch a game right in their own backyard.
